name: Winter Survival (itch)
description:
You have 10 minutes to collect wood. Wood is very rare. When you are outside, you get colder. When you are inside, you warm up.

Make sure your volume is low. Unzip the file. Open the application GGJ 2019. Alt+F4 to quit.

Thanks to the artists on the Unity asset store and turbosquid for all the assets.
